TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WindowState extends System.Enum

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.WindowState Fullscreen = int32(3)

Docs.summary: The window covers the whole screen, including all taskbars and/or panels.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.WindowState Maximized = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The window covers the whole working area, which includes the desktop but not the taskbar and/or panels.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.WindowState Minimized = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The window is minimized to the taskbar (also known as 'iconified').

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.WindowState Normal = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The window is in its normal state.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
